definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to demonstrate/to show how to do sth/demonstration/a model example
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: After a Fan (mould) is made, pour molten bronze into it.
sentences.chinese: 等做好了范之后再把铜液倒进去。

sentences.english: JVG is a really good coach, that's the truth.
sentences.chinese: 范甘地真的是一个很好的教练，那是事实。

sentences.english: I look forward to seeing Feinstein and every member of the Intelligence committee rotting in jail.
sentences.chinese: 期待范太和情报委员会全体成员把牢底坐穿。

sentences.english: Efforts to reach Mr. Binh and a government spokesman were unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 记者希望接洽范清平和政府发言人，但没有成功。

sentences.english: At 2 pm, Miss Fan of children's wear store in their own sit.
sentences.chinese: 下午2时许，范女士在自己的童装店里闲坐。
范。巴斯滕是个什么样的人？

sentences.english: Robin van Persie remembers sitting on the coach afterwards feeling completely shell-shocked.
sentences.chinese: 范帕西仍然记得赛后坐在教练席上那种震惊的感觉。

sentences.english: Fan Hai Lei picked up noggin to beverage chrysanthemum tea.
sentences.chinese: 范海勒拿起小茶杯喝了口菊花茶。

sentences.english: Van Til does not deny the legitimacy of extrapolations and negations as such.
sentences.chinese: 范泰尔并没有说，延伸和否定是不合理的作法。

sentences.english: Teacher Fei asked out loud before reaching the girl’s answer.
sentences.chinese: 范老师在看到女孩的回答之前就大声问了出来。

sentences.english: The case of Vannoy is a good instance of that, but it's true throughout.
sentences.chinese: 范诺伊就是个很好的例子，但这整个事情都是真的。

sentences.english: Mistakes demonstrate that we're taking risks.
sentences.chinese: 范错误说明我们感于冒险。

sentences.english: He did as she said, and carried the dead Lady Fan back to his place.
sentences.chinese: 他为她说，死者进行的夫人范回到自己的位置。

sentences.english: Lade Fan separatist forces in the southern region is one of the main strongholds.
sentences.chinese: 拉德范地区是南部分裂势力的主要据点之一。

sentences.english: In a few days, Mrs. Fan got out of bed again, even though she hadn't had any medicine.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，范夫人能起床了，尽管没吃什么药。

sentences.english: When the man sat back down, Teacher Fei nodded gratefully.
sentences.chinese: 男人重新坐下了，范老师感激地点了点头。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
